question: Name the renowned former scientist and chairman of ISRO who passed away recently.
explanation: Internationally-renowned space scientist and former chairman of ISRO (Indian Space Research Organization), Udupi Ramachandra Rao passed away in Bengaluru. He served as Chairman of ISRO from 1984 to 1994. He is credited with having played an instrumental role in building up Indian satellite programmes right from nation's first satellite Aryabhatta.
